attributes.action: Resign for managing the country in such a pathetic manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Prime minister, the labour government has sold all the gold belonging to this country very very cheaply, brought down Northern rock working with King in the bank, brought the police,the teachers on the roads... increased fuel taxes, hiked interest rates casuing many people to loose their homes, bringing unemployment to the local people and opening the doors for illegal migrants and terrorists

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
